name: scale-down-animation

properties.name: isNeonAnimation
properties.description: Can be used to determine that elements implement this behavior.

methods.name: timingFromConfig
methods.description:
Returns the animation timing by mixing in properties from `config` to the defaults defined
by the animation.

methods.name: setPrefixedProperty
methods.description: Sets `transform` and `transformOrigin` properties along with the prefixed versions.

description:
`<scale-down-animation>` animates the scale transform of an element from 1 to 0. By default it
scales in both the x and y axes.

Configuration:
```
{
  name: 'scale-down-animation',
  node: <node>,
  axis: 'x' | 'y' | '',
  transformOrigin: <transform-origin>,
  timing: <animation-timing>
}
```
